"This is Our Way" - 2014 AMA Spectrum award winning ad
"This is Our Way" - 2014 AMA Spectrum award winning ad

Founded Avant as a boutique Ad agency specializing in narrative, messaging, viral stickiness and integrated outreach strategies for our clients. We focus on Advertising, Marketing, Social Media outreach, Website Development and Video Production.
Strategic Messaging Consultant and Viral Video Producer

Message, framing and viral outreach development for non-profits, issue advocacy, candidate and corporate marketing campaigns. Increase web site traffic and user/member lists and participation as well as increase media market share through viral campaigns and videos.Strategic Consulting, including outreach and messaging development.Rapid response and opposition framing.

- Brand development, organizational growth, media outreach, web site design and UI. Developed brand strategy, national outreach and administrative implementation in school districts around the country.- Strategic planning and execution, including business plan & chapter building development.  - Development oversight.

Billionaires For Bush (Billionairesforbush.com) uses humor, media wrenching, culture jamming and satire in order to challenge perceptions and affect change.  We are non-partisan and focus on economic issues.I currently serve as the Campaign Director for our current campaign for the Estate Tax. My duties include crafting online, print and video campaign materials, lead content and graphics personnel and directing online and media outreach.As National Co-Chair, some of my responsibilities include outreach, public speaking and media requests, website maintenance, as well as campaign, project and volunteer management.In 2004 I led the group's 3-month, 12-state, 28-city “Get on the Limo” tour. The tour drew over 100 major media hits, started 10 new chapters and came in 35% under budget. I was responsible for the staging and execution of the tour, initial online fundraising campaign and oversight, safety and care of 15 traveling volunteers.

summary: Boutique creative production and ad agency owner and producer with an entrepreneurial drive. I'm an artist with an mind for business and have extensive experience in new technologies. At Marco Ceglie Creative, I firmly believe in my credo of "fewer clients, more impactful work," as I find much more value in working harder for fewer clients so that I can focus on creating meaningful and effective campaigns,  I believe that being choosy about the clients I serve empowers me to put in the time and energy that leads to those successful outcomes. In my professional life, I'm a proven leader and project manager with savvy Internet marketing skills. I've executed the successful management of projects, products, campaigns and events. Dynamic self-starter with a strong sense of responsibility and positive, aggressive attitude.I'm a producer and creative problem-solver who applies technical skills with professional experience and business knowledge to achieve improved results. Able to manage multiple projects simultaneously and achieve complex objectives. Productive as both individual contributor and team member. Excellent communications and relationship-building skills.Specialties: Advertising, especially helping clients create unique, powerful and truly integrated marketing campaigns. Large project management, crafting viral messaging campaigns for progressive organizations, client-partner relations, account management, branding and messaging.
name: Marco Ceglie
title: Founder and Chief Creative Strategist at Marco Ceglie Creative
